summary: The diff shows Header.tsx was updated to use the QH monogram logo image. Most REQ-15 acceptance criteria are met, but there are some notable deviations worth flagging.

missing_requirements.requirement: Logo image saved as frontend/public/assets/generated/qh-logo.png and referenced accordingly
missing_requirements.reason: The build request specifies the asset should be saved as 'frontend/public/assets/generated/qh-logo.png', but the diff shows Header.tsx references '/assets/generated/qh-logo.dim_256x256.png' instead. No new asset file is listed as added in the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: The 'Quindore Holdings LLC' wordmark text appears beside the monogram in Playfair Display
missing_requirements.reason: The wordmark is split into 'QUINDORE' using font-serif (Playfair Display) and 'Holdings LLC' using font-sans (Inter). The requirement specifies the full wordmark in Playfair Display, but 'Holdings LLC' is rendered in Inter, not Playfair Display.
